Corporate UI for Public Sites

The Public mode mode has a more compact mode than the public setting. This is the default mode for Corporate UI.

Corporate UI for Applications

The App mode has a more compact appearance than the public mode. Just add class="scania app" to the body tag and everyting will be tighter.

An article is an article

If you contain your content within an

<article> tag it will get the layout of an regular news article.
